/*
Vaibhav Sharma

Wap to print the following pattern
===============================================
*/


public class patternn {

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {

		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int i,j;
		for(i=1;i<=3;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=i;j++)
				System.out.print(j);
			System.out.println();
		}
	}

}
